Header.title: Hamed zadeh
Header.paragraph: Full-Stack Developer, Frontend Developer, Web Designer.

About.paragraph: As a React full stack developer with two years of experience, I possess a strong foundation in the technologies related to the stack. My expertise includes proficiency in React.js, Node.js, Redux.js, WebGL, Three.js , among other technologies. I have a strong understanding of both front-end and back-end development, as well as experience in building scalable and responsive web applications. As a highly motivated and dedicated individual, I am always eager to learn new technologies and techniques that can help me improve my development skills. I am committed to staying up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in web development and am always looking for ways to improve my work. In addition to my technical skills, I also possess excellent communication and collaboration abilities. I am able to work well within a team environment, and am comfortable communicating complex technical concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders. Overall, as a React full stack developer with two years of experience, I bring a strong foundation in the latest technologies related to the stack, a passion for learning and improving, and excellent communication and collaboration abilities to any project I work on.

Features.title: Node.js
Features.text: working on all the backend parts with using Node, Redux, Strapi and SQlite based on project's requirements.

Features.title: THREE.js
Features.text: animations and interactive experience for users with using this amazing framework.

Features.title: SASS
Features.text: Designing the UI part with CSS, SASS, Bootstrap and other technologies.
